entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
